Digital Transformation Needs Good APIs Erik Wilde (@dret): The Future of API Management

(7) Business Matters

Digital Transformation means adapting an organization's strategy and structure to capture opportunities enabled by digital technology. (Nathan Furr and Andrew Shipilov, Digital Doesn't Have to Be Disruptive, Harvard Business Review 97(4), July/August 2019, pp. 94-103) [https://hbr.org/2019/07/digital-doesnt-have-to-be-disruptive]


Digital Transformation Needs Good APIs Erik Wilde (@dret): The Future of API Management

(12) What is a Good API? Useful ≫ Findable ≫ Usable

  1. Useful means that it addresses consumers' Jobs to Be Done [https://hbr.org/2016/09/know-your-customers-jobs-to-be-done]
  2. Findable means that potential consumers have a fighting chance of finding it
  3. Usable means that the product makes it easy to get their jobs done


Digital Transformation Needs Good APIs Erik Wilde (@dret): The Future of API Management

(13) API Consumption Matters



Digital Transformation Needs Good APIs Erik Wilde (@dret): The Future of API Management

(14) Why? The Network Effects Needs a Network

  • It's ineffective to do digital transformation light
  • ROI grows more than linear because options grow more than linear
  • Find lighthouse projects to demonstrate ROI and potential


Digital Transformation Needs Good APIs Erik Wilde (@dret): The Future of API Management
